export var InstallmentActionTypes={GET_LIST:"GET_LIST",GET_LIST_SUCCESS:"GET_LIST_SUCCESS",GET_LIST_ERROR:"GET_LIST_ERROR",GET_DETAIL:"GET_DETAIL",GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS:"GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS",GET_DETAIL_ERROR:"GET_DETAIL_ERROR",CREATE:"CREATE",CREATE_SUCCESS:"CREATE_SUCCESS",CREATE_ERROR:"CREATE_ERROR",UPDATE:"UPDATE",UPDATE_SUCCESS:"UPDATE_SUCCESS",UPDATE_ERROR:"UPDATE_ERROR",DELETE:"DELETE",DELETE_SUCCESS:"DELETE_SUCCESS",DELETE_ERROR:"DELETE_ERROR",FILTER:"FILTER",FILTER_SUCCESS:"FILTER_SUCCESS",CLEAR_DETAIL:"CLEAR_DETAIL"};Object.keys(InstallmentActionTypes).forEach(function(key){InstallmentActionTypes[key]="INSTALLMENT_".concat(InstallmentActionTypes[key]);});var onClearDetail=function onClearDetail(){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.CLEAR_DETAIL};};//----------------  Get list  ----------------------
var onGetList=function onGetList(payload){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.GET_LIST,payload:payload};};var onGetListSuccess=function onGetListSuccess(list,total){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.GET_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:{list:list,total:total}};};var onGetListError=function onGetListError(error){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.GET_LIST_ERROR,payload:error};};//----------------  Get Detail  --------------------
var onGetDetail=function onGetDetail(id){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.GET_DETAIL,id:id};};var onGetDetailSuccess=function onGetDetailSuccess(data){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.GET_DETAIL_SUCCESS,payload:data};};var onGetDetailError=function onGetDetailError(error){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.GET_DETAIL_ERROR,payload:error};};//----------------  Create  ----------------------
var onCreate=function onCreate(params){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.CREATE,payload:params};};var onCreateSuccess=function onCreateSuccess(detail){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.CREATE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onCreateError=function onCreateError(error){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.CREATE_ERROR,payload:error};};//----------------  Delete ----------------------
var onDelete=function onDelete(_ref){var id=_ref.id;return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.DELETE,id:id};};var onDeleteSuccess=function onDeleteSuccess(detail){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.DELETE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onDeleteError=function onDeleteError(error){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.DELETE_ERROR,payload:error};};//-----------------  Update  ---------------------
var onUpdate=function onUpdate(_ref2){var id=_ref2.id,data=_ref2.data,params=_ref2.params;return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.UPDATE,payload:{id:id,data:data,params:params}};};var onUpdateSuccess=function onUpdateSuccess(detail){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.UPDATE_SUCCESS,payload:detail};};var onUpdateError=function onUpdateError(error){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.UPDATE_ERROR,payload:error};};//----------------  Filter  ----------------------
var onFilter=function onFilter(keyword){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.FILTER,payload:{keyword:keyword}};};var onFilterSuccess=function onFilterSuccess(data){return{type:InstallmentActionTypes.FILTER_SUCCESS,payload:data};};var InstallmentActions={onGetList:onGetList,onGetListSuccess:onGetListSuccess,onGetListError:onGetListError,onClearDetail:onClearDetail,onFilter:onFilter,onFilterSuccess:onFilterSuccess,onGetDetail:onGetDetail,onGetDetailSuccess:onGetDetailSuccess,onGetDetailError:onGetDetailError,onCreate:onCreate,onCreateSuccess:onCreateSuccess,onCreateError:onCreateError,onUpdate:onUpdate,onUpdateSuccess:onUpdateSuccess,onUpdateError:onUpdateError,onDelete:onDelete,onDeleteSuccess:onDeleteSuccess,onDeleteError:onDeleteError};export default InstallmentActions;
